name: Diablo
description: This script will install "Diablo" and his extension "Hellfire" GOG edition.During install please let all options by default.Thanks to the people who contributed to play this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- Please report issue concerning this script on my github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/
content:
custom-name: Diablo - GOG
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Diablo/dx/DiabloLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Running Setup, please wait...
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: ddraw
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: native,builtin
wine:
  Desktop: true
